content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ExternalAggWeather (
    date NVARCHAR(100),
    avg_temp_C FLOAT, 
    avg_humidity FLOAT,
    avg_wind_speed FLOAT,
    max_temp_F FLOAT,
    min_temp_F FLOAT,
    weather_records BIGINT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'gold/agg_weather/agg_weather.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = MyDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat 
);
GO
